channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16607] Make NoncedRegionServerCallable extend CancellableRegionServerCallable
item.description:
This is the first step to unify append, increment with AP.

And after extends CancellableRegionServerCallable, we could remove lots of duplicate code in NoncedRegionServerCallable

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Have you verified that failure in TestReplicasClient was not related to the patch ?

Thanks Ted Yu for your review. I check it locally, it has no relates with the patch. It failed sometimes with or without this patch. Open another issue for the flaky test case. And replicasClient has no relates with NoncedRegionServerCallable, it is only Get/Scan requests.
Flakey test case will be fixed in HBASE-16611
Makes sense. I currently have a patch that does same thing. Thanks Heng Chen
